ch0012_10_corni/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been waiting
for you!
ch0012_10_corni/0101_0701_02_10:
Training can get pretty difficult, but let’s push
through and give it our all!
ch0012_10_corni/7101_0701_01_10:
Did you know? My grandpa is famous in the
Kalos region!
ch0012_10_corni/7101_0701_02_10: He calls himself the Mega Evolution guru.
ch0012_10_corni/7101_0701_03_10:
Even Professor Sycamore recognizes him as an
expert on Mega Evolution!
ch0012_10_corni/7101_0701_04_10: I’ve learned a lot from Grandpa!
ch0012_10_corni/7102_0701_01_10:
Hey, what do you think of my sygna suit? Pretty
cool, huh?
ch0012_10_corni/7102_0701_02_10:
It helps me focus and makes me feel stronger
than ever!
ch0012_10_corni/7102_0701_03_10: It’s like I’m at maximum power!
ch0012_10_corni/7103_0701_02_10:
When it sees a stranger, it immediately hides itself
in the shadows.
ch0012_10_corni/7103_0701_03_10:
Marshadow always responds to me when I call
out to it, though!
ch0012_10_corni/7104_0701_01_10:
I was training with Bea and Maylene the
other day.
ch0012_10_corni/7104_0701_02_10:
We all move our bodies in such different ways,
so I learned a lot from training with them!
ch0012_10_corni/7105_0701_01_10:
Since meeting Marshadow, I’ve learned
how important it is to be conscious of
people’s movements.
ch0012_10_corni/7105_0701_02_10:
Do you have anybody that you draw inspiration
from, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0012_10_corni/1701_0701_01_10:
I must admit that your strength far exceeds mine.
Take this—I award it to you.
ch0012_10_corni/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you find it useful!
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0701_01_10:
I usually ride around Pasio on my roller skates,
so I didn’t notice this before...
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0701_02_10:
but there are so new many things to discover by
just walking around!
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s such a great feeling to randomly find something
like a bakery, especially when it turns out to have
all sorts of yummy goodies!
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve got an idea! Do you want to try
roller skating?
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0702_02_10:
If Marshadow and I coach you, I bet you’d learn in
no time!
ch0012_10_corni/2501_0702_03_10: Oh, but you’ll need to put on a helmet and pads!
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0701_01_10:
Marshadow can slip into the shadow of a person
or a Pokémon and mimic their powers.
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0701_02_10:
But when Marshadow first met my Lucario, it was
so quick to try to enter Lucario’s shadow...
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0701_03_10: that it ended up crashing into the ground.
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0701_04_10:
Lucario had noticed Marshadow and jumped out of
the way. But now they’re good friends!
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0702_01_10:
Lucario and Marshadow spend a lot of time
training together.
ch0012_10_corni/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s so touching when I see that, because I
remember how awkward they used to be
around each other.
ch0012_10_corni/3001_0701_01_10:
A brisk morning jog is a nice change from
skating—even the wind feels different!
ch0012_10_corni/3003_0701_01_10:
Whenever I look up at the sky, it lifts my spirits
and makes me feel invincible!
ch0012_10_corni/3005_0701_01_10:
What a busy day! I’m already a little sleepy...
You should rest up, too!
